title: The Xiaomi/Leica partnership, explained
description:
Get access to Nebula & my sponsor, Curiositystream: https://curiositystream.com/tfc

 ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬  
 
►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week Leica dropped their partnership with Huawei and switched to Xiaomi, Microsoft announced Project Volterra and other Windows on ARM updates and Broadcom bought VMware for $61 billion.

Episode 98

This video on Nebula: https://nebula.app/videos/the-friday-checkout-huawei-wont-leica-this
